name: Paper Aeronauts
description:
Made alone during a 4 day Game-Jam during Covid.

A little relaxation game about a bored girl and a flying tissue.

Language : the game is in frensh, but it should be playable by anyone !

Play as long as you find relaxation in it.

Please leave a comment if you've enjoyed it !

Known issues :

- The tissue might get stuck on random things, try to reload the game
